panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled incoming requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", handler="receive",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / ignoring (code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", handler="receive"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle incoming requests in quantiles.
panels.title: Duration
Rate of write requests (by tenant and code)

targets.expr: sum by (tenant, code) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code!~"2.."}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Number of errors (by tenant and code)

targets.expr: sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum{job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job, tenant) (http_request_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive"})

sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_sum{job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_count{job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Average successful HTTP request size (per tenant and code, only 2XX)

targets.expr: sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_sum{job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code!~"2.."}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job, tenant) (rate(http_request_size_bytes_count{job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive", code!~"2.."}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Average failed HTTP request size (per tenant and code, non 2XX)

targets.expr: sum by (job, tenant, method) (http_inflight_requests{job=~"$job", tenant=~"$tenant", handler="receive"})

panels.title: Rate of series received (per tenant, only 2XX)
Rate of series not written (per tenant and code, non 2XX)
Rate of samples received (per tenant, only 2XX)
Rate of samples not written (per tenant and code, non 2XX)

panels.description: Shows rate of replications to other receive nodes.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of replications to other receive nodes.
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows rate of forwarded requests to other receive nodes.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of forwarded requests to other receive nodes.
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary", grpc_method!="RemoteWrite"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests from queriers.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows the relative time of last successful upload to the object-store bucket.
panels.title: Successful Upload
